resources.string: Returns true if the key resides inside secure hardware (e.g., Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) or Secure Element (SE)).\nKey material of such keys is available in plaintext only inside the secure hardware and is not exposed outside of it.
User Authentication Requirement Enforced By Secure Hardware
Returns true if the requirement that this key can only be used if the user has been authenticated is enforced by secure hardware (e.g., Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) or Secure Element (SE)).
Device is older than API level 23 (Android 6.0)!
Ready (click in order to perform the hardware check)
